data.name: ThreadSpace: Hyperbol Demo
data.detailed_description: The demo version of Iocaine Studios' futuristic multiplayer action-strategy game offers four hours of free play. Battle up to 16 players on four of the eighteen maps available in the retail version.
data.about_the_game: The demo version of Iocaine Studios' futuristic multiplayer action-strategy game offers four hours of free play. Battle up to 16 players on four of the eighteen maps available in the retail version.
data.short_description: The demo version of Iocaine Studios' futuristic multiplayer action-strategy game offers four hours of free play. Battle up to 16 players on four of the eighteen maps available in the retail version.

pc_requirements.minimum: Minimum: Windows 2000/XP/Vista, DirectX9.0c or higher, Graphics Accelerator with 32-bit color support (DirectX9-Supported Accelerator recommended), 1.0GHz or faster processor, 256MB of RAM, 400MB of hard disk space
